video.title: The Pioneer Woman Collection
video.synopsis: Best-selling cookbook author Ree Drummond shares her special brand of home cooking, from throw-together suppers to elegant celebrations.

episodes.synopsis: Ree's mom and sister are visiting the ranch, and the women are conjuring up family recipes, including seafood pasta, crème brûlée and spinach salad.
episodes.title: Triple Act

episodes.synopsis: Ree welcomes her dad and stepmom to the ranch with filets and peppercorn sauce, Caesar salad, buttered rosemary rolls and cherry almond crisp.
episodes.title: Family Matters

episodes.synopsis: Ree makes delicious muffins for breakfast and cooks up a real ranch favorite for lunch: chicken spaghetti with apple, pecan and blue cheese salad.
episodes.title: Burning Down the Barn

episodes.synopsis: Ree's hosts a slumber party for Paige and her four best friends, serving cinnamon baked French toast, prairie sushi and kid-friendly pasta salad.
episodes.title: Paige and Friends

episodes.synopsis: It's fiesta time on the ranch, where Ree's creating a truly classic Mexican feast with tequila lime chicken, refried black beans and rice casserole.
episodes.title: Frontier Fiesta

episodes.synopsis: Ree's handing out granola bars to the kids as they set off for a riding lesson. Later, Ree makes care packages with sloppy joes and tasty carrot cake.
episodes.title: Horsing Around

episodes.synopsis: Alex's birthday celebration starts with prune cake and buttermilk icing. Ree also cooks up a chopped salad, rosemary focaccia and flower pot desserts.
episodes.title: Alex's Birthday

episodes.synopsis: The Drummonds are throwing a party for Ladd's father, and the menu includes rib-eye steak, smashed potatoes, corn and strawberry sparkle cake.
episodes.title: For Papa

episodes.synopsis: Ladd and the kids have been up since first light, so Ree's rustling up a lunch of Salisbury steak, fettuccine alfredo and chocolate peanut butter pie.
episodes.title: Family Favorites

episodes.synopsis: The family gets together for a ranch-style competition and celebrates with tangy tomato brisket, onion strings and broccoli with cheese dipping sauce.
episodes.title: Ranch Games

episodes.synopsis: Ree is celebrating all the things she loves with a menu of mac and cheese, bacon-wrapped filet, white-wine spritzers and cream-filled cupcakes.
episodes.title: Ten Things I Love

episodes.synopsis: Ree has two special deliveries to make: sweet orange rolls and peppered bacon. She also makes root vegetable beef stew and creamy cheddar grits.
episodes.title: Special Delivery

episodes.synopsis: It's football season for the sports-loving family, so the day starts with cookies. Later, Ree makes beef-and-bean burritos and jumbo pico salad.
episodes.title: Food and Football

episodes.synopsis: Ree prepares a spectacular brunch with a glorious baked glazed ham, drop biscuits, baked eggs and zesty fruit salad with orange-vanilla syrup.
episodes.title: Sunday Brunch

episodes.synopsis: Ree and the kids are surprising Ladd's grandmother with a birthday care package of roast chicken, cauliflower soup and a blueberry Italian cream cake.
episodes.title: Edna Mae's Birthday

episodes.synopsis: Ree's investment club gathers for the first time in 10 years, and she's bringing a mouth-watering, Mexican-inspired menu.
episodes.title: Investment Reunion Dinner

episodes.synopsis: Ree's spreading out a pickup picnic with spicy roasted chicken legs, cowboy bacon beans, deviled eggs and mocha brownies.
episodes.title: Pickup Picnic

episodes.synopsis: Ree's take on boxed lunches includes club sandwiches, individual portions of Greek salad, homemade black-pepper potato chips and cookies.
episodes.title: The Building

episodes.synopsis: Ree cooks up quick meals with 30-minute meatball sandwiches, 20-minute penne, 10-minute buffalo chicken salad and easy green-chili enchiladas.
episodes.title: Time Tested

episodes.synopsis: Ree's "best things in the world" include comfort classics like tomato soup, grilled cheese, scrambled eggs and yogurt parfaits.
episodes.title: Simply the Best
